quotes: In the fall of 1982, I received an offer to teach as an associate professor at MIT, which I accepted.
Having just met my future wife Nathalie (we got married in 1984), who had to finish her master degree in law at the University of Paris in 1983–1984, I started to teach at MIT in September 1984.
Having just met my future wife Nathalie (we got married in 1984), who had to finish her master degree in law at the University of Paris in 1983–1984, I started to teach at MIT in September 1984.
Having just met my future wife Nathalie (we got married in 1984), who had to finish her master degree in law at the University of Paris in 1983–1984, I started to teach at MIT in September 1984.
1984–1991: Back to MIT, the Consolidation Years
When in 1992 I decided to stay in Toulouse, I was invited to be a visiting professor for six weeks per year (four of them during July, when I teach a minicourse for PhD students).

time_markers.text: This year will be the 24th year of this yearly arrangement
quotes: This year will be the 24th year of this yearly arrangement, from which I have benefited a lot.
